title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicking on it.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and verify that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
